post.author: Dolly Parton
post.summary: You can do anything you want to do as long as you keep a good attitude and keep working at it. But the second you give up, you’re screwed.

post.author: Tessa Afshar
post.summary: “We long for things that harm us and run from the things that grow and heal us. We think good is bad and bad is good.”

post.author: Israelmore A.
post.summary: “No matter how short or long your journey to your accomplishment is, if you don't begin you can't get there. Beginning is difficult, but unavoidable!”

post.author: Steven Magee
post.summary: “It is well known that staying slim and taking nutritional supplements leads to longevity. The Japanese are rarely fat and live long lives.”

post.author: Supratim Das
post.summary: “If the stairs feel long, focus on each step. Enjoy the climb, without fixating on the top.”
